thread.title: Lenovo Phab Plus with Huge 6.8-Inch Display Goes on Sale in India for $283

author: newsr.in
title: Lenovo Phab Plus with Huge 6.8-Inch Display Goes on Sale in India for $283
text: Lenovo introduced its tablet/smartphone hybrid Phab Plus in late August and showcased it again at IFA 2015. Not long afterwards, the phablet was made available for purchase in select markets. And now Lenovo is bringing it to the Indian market. The Chinese company is offering the huge device via Â»
